summary: A sustainable fashion marketplace website with clothing submission functionality through pop-ups for resale, upcycle, and recycle options
architectural_notes: Modal/pop-up based submission workflow for clothing items
Credit system for tracking user contributions
known_issues: Upcycle and Recycle buttons not functioning (needs pop-up implementation)

existing_features.title: Create a pop-up dialog component that opens when clicking the Resale, Upcycle, or Recycle buttons in MaterialGradeDashboard, replacing the current external link behavior
Add form fields in the submission pop-up for: clothing/dress type (text input or dropdown), number of pieces (numeric input), and display calculated credits earned based on the category and quantity
Update GreenCreditWallet balance when submissions are successfully processed, adding the earned credits to the user's total
Maintain a simple, clean interface design consistent with the existing sage green and off-white color palette

new_feature_requests.summary: Pop-up forms for Resale, Upcycle, and Recycle buttons to submit clothing details (type, quantity) and display credits earned
Store clothing submissions in backend state with fields for submission type (resale/upcycle/recycle), clothing type, quantity, credits earned, and timestamp
